per_frame_init_1=state_rot = 0;
per_frame_init_2=state_ori = 0;
per_frame_init_3=state = 0;
per_frame_init_4=xs = 0;
per_frame_init_5=xy = 0;
per_frame_1=bass_clip = above(bass_att,bass_clip)*2 + (1-above(bass_att,bass_clip))*((bass_clip-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_frame_2=basstime = basstime + (bass_att*0.09)*bass_att*0.25 + time*0.1;
per_frame_3=
per_frame_4=//state for orientation
per_frame_5=state_ori = state_ori + equal(bass_clip,2);
per_frame_6=//extra state rot and ori will not be linked
per_frame_7=state_ori = if(above(state_ori,4),1, state_ori);
per_frame_8=
per_frame_9=echo_orient = state_ori;
per_frame_10=
per_frame_11=//another state machine for shape tracking
per_frame_12=state = state + equal(bass_clip,2);
per_frame_13=state = if(above(state,4), 0, state);
per_frame_14=
per_frame_15=//add bouns on beat
per_frame_16=xs = xs + 0.1*equal(2,bass_clip);
per_frame_17=ys = ys + 0.1*equal(2,bass_clip);
per_frame_18=
per_frame_19=//state 0 elipse
per_frame_20=xs = xs + (equal(0,state))*atan(bass_time*4)*0.1;
per_frame_21=ys = ys + (equal(0,state))*cos(bass_time*4)*0.1;
per_frame_22=
per_frame_23=//state 1 diag
per_frame_24=xs = xs + (equal(1,state))*cos(bass_time*4)*0.1;
per_frame_25=ys = ys + (equal(1,state))*cos(bass_time*4)*0.1;
per_frame_26=
per_frame_27=//state 2 -circle
per_frame_28=xs = xs + (equal(2,state))*cos(bass_time*4)*0.1;
per_frame_29=ys = ys + (equal(2,state))*sin(bass_time*4)*0.1;
per_frame_30=
per_frame_31=//state 3 parametric arc
per_frame_32=xs = xs + (equal(3,state))*cos(bass_time*5)*0.1;
per_frame_33=ys = ys + (equal(3,state))*cos(bass_time*9)*0.1;
per_frame_34=
per_frame_35=//state 4 arc
per_frame_36=xs = xs + (equal(4,state))*atan(bass_time*6)*0.1;
per_frame_37=ys = ys + (equal(4,state))*cos(bass_time*2)*0.1;
per_frame_38=
per_frame_39=ib_r = ib_r + 0.5*sin(time*0.899);
per_frame_40=ib_g = ib_g + 0.5*sin(time*0.687);
per_frame_41=ib_b = ib_b + 0.5*sin(time*1.225);
per_frame_42=
per_frame_43=//project and publish
per_frame_44=q1 = 0.5 + 0.4*sin(xs);
per_frame_45=q2 = 0.5 + 0.4*sin(ys);
per_frame_46=
per_frame_47=q3 = 0.5 + 0.4*sin(xs + 3.14);
per_frame_48=q4 = 0.5 + 0.4*sin(ys + 3.14);
per_frame_49=
per_frame_50=q5 = state_rot;
per_pixel_1=zoom = 0.95 + (rad - 0.5)*0.1 - (rad - 0.75)*0.1;
per_pixel_2=
per_pixel_3=q5 = 0;
per_pixel_4=
per_pixel_5=rot = q5*0.05 + below(q5,0)*ang*0.05*q5 - above(q5,0)*ang*0.05*q5;
per_pixel_6=
per_pixel_7=dx = 1 + (q1-0.5)*0.1*x*x;
per_pixel_8=dy = 1 + (q2- 0.5)*0.1*y*y;
per_pixel_9=
per_pixel_10=dx = 1 + (q1-0.5)*0.1*x;
per_pixel_11=dy = 1 + (q2-0.5)*0.1*y;
